headline: The Big Surprises And Glaring Snubs
abstract: An #OscarsSoWhite outcome was just barely averted, but the best-director lineup is all male once again.
lead_paragraph: The Oscar nominations Monday morning brought good news for films like “1917,” “Parasite,” and “Once Upon a Time … in Hollywood,” but other major contenders fell just short of the finish line. Below, your Carpetbagger surveys the nomination list for the biggest surprises and most high-profile snubs.
